post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Ipsos-NPD Canada, Inc. is a member of the Ipsos group of companies, the 9th largest research group in the world. Whether for brands, companies or institutional clients, we report on how the market is changing.

We have an immediate opening for:

CATI PROGRAMMER

The ideal candidate will have 1-3 years programming experience. Ideally, the candidate will have experience in a CATI (Computer Assisted Telephone Interviewing) environment. Prior experience with Quancept and Quantum would be an definite asset. Strong Analytical and problem solving skills are required for this position.

We offer a competitive starting salary, good benefits and working atmosphere as well as the opportunity to grow in a challenging position. If interested, please forward your resume stating salary requirements (in confidence) to:

Human Resources
Ipsos-NPD Canada, Inc.
240 Duncan Mill Road, Suite 200
Toronto, ON
M3B 3R6
FAX: (416) 445-2876
e-mail: hr_canada@ipsos-npd.com

We thank all applicants for their interest, however only those selected for an interview will be contacted.


Additional Information
Salary: CAD 30,000.00 to CAD 35,000.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Employee  


Contact Information
Jaime Williston
jaime_williston@ipsos-npd.com
Ipsos-NPD Canada, Inc.
240 Duncan Mill Road, Suite 200
Toronto ON
Fax: 416-445-2876
post.title: CATI PROGRAMMER
